iopair.name: C-C476C-SUBV-09-ST01-DT05-DF16-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Read a space-delimited string from the input. The first element in the string is the number of elements following it. Then read in the following elements, and output them to stderr. If there are fewer elements than expected, a seg fault occurs.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C476C-SUBV-09-ST01-DT05-DF16-CF20-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Read a space-delimited string from the input. The first element in the string is the number of elements following it. Then read in the following elements, and output them to stderr. If there are fewer elements than expected, a seg fault occurs.

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
